ui_ux_improvements.title: Event Type Differentiation
ui_ux_improvements.description: Implement visual distinction between event types with color coding system, icon system, status indicators, and priority highlighting.

subtasks.title: Implement color coding system for different event types
Create icon system for quick recognition

comments:
Visual distinction between event types:
- Color coding system:
  * Delivery events: Blue-based
  * Exam events: Red-based
  * Collection events: Green-based
  * Absence/cancellation: Orange-based
- Icon system for quick recognition
- Status indicators
- Priority highlighting
